top_questions.text: The process of transferring data or files from a local device to a remote system, server, or online platforms.​

What is form? List its uses.​ f) What is hardware security? List any four methods to protect the data from your computer.​ g) What is bus topology? Mention any two differences between bus and ring topology.​ h) What is B2C? Give any two examples of B2C in Nepal.​ i) What is query? List its types.
